archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: X-MYLEVEL3 CUSTOMER PORTAL
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Portal de integracion de Servicios de consulta de los clientes para facturacion, requerimiento, informes, etc. The MyLevel3 Portal is part of Control Center and allows customers to access sales and marketing collateral, Quote and Order several products, create/view trouble tickets, view invoices, manage enterprise voice products, as well as Security Analytics. MyLevel3 has a combined login and global navigation with Control Center.
